blocks.content: Extend class notation to include division.

diff.cdiv.c
diff.cdiv.w
df-div
blocks.content: Define division. Theorem ~ divmuli relates it to multiplication, and ~ divcli and ~ redivcli prove its closure laws. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1995.) Use ~ divval instead. (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Apr-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: 1div0
blocks.content: You can't divide by zero, because division explicitly excludes zero from the domain of the function. Thus, by the definition of function value, it evaluates to the empty set. (This theorem is for information only and normally is not referenced by other proofs. To be meaningful, it assumes that ` (/) ` is not a complex number, which depends on the particular complex number construction that is used.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Apr-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1div0() {
  |- wceq(co(nat1, cdiv, nat0), emptycls)
} = {
  mp2an(wceq(co(nat1, cdiv, nat0), emptycls), wceq(cdm(cdiv), cxp(cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))), wn(wa(wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(nat0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))))
  dmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cdiv, cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), crio(hs2, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))
  df-div(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  riotaex(hs2, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))
  ax-mp(wn(wa(wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(nat0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))), wceq(nat0, nat0))
  eqid(nat0)
  necon2bi(nat0, nat0, wa(wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(nat0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))))
  adantl(wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(nat0, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wne(nat0, nat0))
  eldifsni(nat0, cc, nat0)
  ndmovg(cdiv, cc, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), nat1, nat0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 1div0() {
  ⊢ (1[÷]0)= ∅
} = {
  mp2an((1[÷]0)= ∅, dom(÷)=(ℂ ×(ℂ \ { 0 })), ¬(1 ∈ ℂ ∧ 0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })))
  dmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cdiv, cc, (ℂ \ { 0 }), iota(hs2 ∈ ℂ,(hs1[×]hs2)= hs0))
  df-div(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  riotaex(hs2, cc, (hs1[×]hs2)= hs0)
  ax-mp(¬(1 ∈ ℂ ∧ 0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })), 0 = 0)
  eqid(nat0)
  necon2bi(nat0, nat0, (1 ∈ ℂ ∧ 0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 })))
  adantl(1 ∈ ℂ, 0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), 0 ≠ 0)
  eldifsni(nat0, cc, nat0)
  ndmovg(cdiv, cc, (ℂ \ { 0 }), nat1, nat0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c((ℂ \ { 0 }))
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c((ℂ \ { 0 }))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
}

blocks.name: divval
blocks.content: Value of division: if ` A ` and ` B ` are complex numbers with ` B ` nonzero, then ` ( A / B ) ` is the (unique) complex number such that ` ( B x. x ) = A ` . (Contributed by NM, 8-May-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm divval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0))))
  sylan2br(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(c1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eldifsn(c1, cc, nat0)
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cc, c1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0)), cdiv, crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0)), crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(s0)), c0)))
  riotabidv(s0, cc, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(s0)), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(s0)))
  riotabidv(s0, cc, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(s0)), c0, co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c1, cmul, cv(s0))
  df-div(hs0, hs1, s0)
  riotaex(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(cc, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs1.c(crio(s0, cc, wceq(co(c1, cmul, cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm divval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ≠ 0)→(c0[÷]c1)= iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[×]s0)= c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3impb(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, c1 ≠ 0, (c0[÷]c1)= iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[×]s0)= c0))
  sylan2br(c0 ∈ ℂ, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ≠ 0), (c0[÷]c1)= iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[×]s0)= c0), c1 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  eldifsn(c1, cc, nat0)
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, cc, c1, (ℂ \ { 0 }), cdiv, iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[×]s0)= c0), iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(hs1[×]s0)= hs0), iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(hs1[×]s0)= c0))
  riotabidv(s0, cc, hs0 = c0, (hs1[×]s0)= hs0, (hs1[×]s0)= c0)
  eqeq2(hs0, c0, (hs1[×]s0))
  riotabidv(s0, cc, hs1 = c1, (hs1[×]s0)= c0, (c1[×]s0)= c0)
  eqeq1d((hs1[×]s0), c0, (c1[×]s0), hs1 = c1)
  oveq1(hs1, c1, cmul, s0)
  df-div(hs0, hs1, s0)
  riotaex(s0, cc, (c1[×]s0)= c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((ℂ \ { 0 }))
  diff.hs0.c(iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[×]s0)= c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((ℂ \ { 0 }))
  diff.hs1.c(iota(s0 ∈ ℂ,(c1[×]s0)= c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: divmul
blocks.content: Relationship between division and multiplication. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm divmul(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wb(wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c2), c1), wceq(co(c2, cmul, c1), c0)))
} = {
  bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c2), c1), wceq(co(c2, cmul, c1), c0), wceq(crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0)), c1))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cdiv, c2), c1, crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c2), crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c2), crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  divval(hs0, c0, c2)
  3imp3i2an(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wb(wceq(co(c2, cmul, c1), c0), wceq(crio(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0)), c1)), wcel(c1, cc), wreu(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wreu(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  receu(hs0, c0, c2)
  riota2(hs0, c1, cc, wceq(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(co(c2, cmul, c1), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c2, cmul, cv(hs0)), c0, co(c2, cmul, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c2, cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c2, cmul, c1), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm divmul(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ≠ 0))→((c0[÷]c2)= c1 ↔(c2[×]c1)= c0))
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ≠ 0)), (c0[÷]c2)= c1, (c2[×]c1)= c0, iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c2[×]hs0)= c0)= c1)
  eqeq1d((c0[÷]c2), c1, iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c2[×]hs0)= c0), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ≠ 0)))
  3adant2(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ≠ 0), (c0[÷]c2)= iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c2[×]hs0)= c0))
  3expb(c0 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ, c2 ≠ 0, (c0[÷]c2)= iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c2[×]hs0)= c0))
  divval(hs0, c0, c2)
  3imp3i2an(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ≠ 0), ((c2[×]c1)= c0 ↔ iota(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c2[×]hs0)= c0)= c1), c1 ∈ ℂ, ∃!(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c2[×]hs0)= c0))
  simp2(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ≠ 0))
  3expb(c0 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ, c2 ≠ 0, ∃!(hs0 ∈ ℂ,(c2[×]hs0)= c0))
  receu(hs0, c0, c2)
  riota2(hs0, c1, cc, (c2[×]hs0)= c0, (c2[×]c1)= c0)
  eqeq1d((c2[×]hs0), c0, (c2[×]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c2, cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w((c2[×]c1)= c0)
}

blocks.content: Relationship between division and reciprocal. Theorem I.9 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm divrec(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))))
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), wceq(co(c1, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), c0))
  3eqtrd(co(c1, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), c0, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(c0, cmul, nat1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  mul12d(c1, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  oveq2d(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1))
  recid(c1)
  mulid1d(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), wceq(co(c1, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  mulcld(c0, co(nat1, cdiv, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cc))
  reccl(c1)
  3simpc(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  divmul(c0, co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), c1)
}

blocks.name: divass
blocks.content: An associative law for division. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm divass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  syl3an3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), cc))
  reccl(c2)
  mulass(c0, c1, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c1)
  divrec(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2)
  oveq2d(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  simp3l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simp3r(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  divrec(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: div23
blocks.content: A commutative/associative law for division. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm div23(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cmul, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cmul, c1), co(co(c1, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2), co(c1, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c1, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c2, co(c1, cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mulcom(c0, c1)
  3com12(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c1, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2), co(c1, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, c2))))
  divass(c1, c0, c2)
  mulcomd(c1, co(c0, cdiv, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cc))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cc))
  divcl(c0, c2)
}

  3anass(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))

  eqcomd(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cdiv, c3)), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c3), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cdiv, c3), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cdiv, c3))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))

blocks.name: divdir

thm divdir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), caddc, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  adddird(c0, c1, co(nat1, cdiv, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), cc))
  reccl(c2)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  addcld(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  divrec(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  divrec(c0, c2)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c2))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  simp3l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simp3r(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  divrec(c1, c2)
}

  mulcand(c2, co(c0, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cdiv, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))

  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))

  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c2, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), c1), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))

thm muldivdir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  syld3an1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(co(co(c2, cmul, c0), caddc, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, c2))), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c0), cc))
  mulcld(c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  simp3l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  divdir(co(c2, cmul, c0), c1, c2)
  oveq1d(co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, c2), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2), c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  biimpri(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  3anass(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  divcan3(c0, c2)

  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(cneg(co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cneg(c1), cdiv, c2)))
  3expb(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wceq(cneg(co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(cneg(c1), cdiv, c2)))
  divneg(c1, c2)

  3adant2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2), c0))

blocks.name: recrec
blocks.content: A number is equal to the reciprocal of its reciprocal. Theorem I.10 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)

blocks.name: rec11
blocks.content: Reciprocal is one-to-one. (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rec11(class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  3bitr2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))), wceq(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), nat1))

  1cnd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cc))

  simpl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  divmul(nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, c1), c0)
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cdiv, c1), nat1, co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))

blocks.name: divdivdiv

blocks.origin:
thm divdivdiv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  simprll(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))
  oveq1d(co(co(c1, cdiv, c3), cmul, c3), cmul, c2, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c1, cdiv, c3), cmul, c3), c1))
  3expb(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0), wceq(co(co(c1, cdiv, c3), cmul, c3), c1))
  divcan1(c1, c3)
}

  3expb(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cdiv, c1), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))))

blocks.content: Cancellation law for division and multiplication. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Jun-2013.) (Proof shortened by Fan Zheng, 3-Jul-2016.)

thm dmdcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cmul, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), co(c2, cdiv, c1), co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), cdiv, c1), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl112anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), cdiv, c1), co(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cmul, co(c2, cdiv, c0))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c0), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  syl3anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c0), cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  divcl(c2, c0)
  simp2l(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp2r(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(c2, cc))
  div23(c0, co(c2, cdiv, c0), c1)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), cdiv, c1, c2, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cdiv, c0)), c2), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp1l(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp1r(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  divcan2(c2, c0)
}

  mpanr2(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cdiv, nat1)), co(co(c0, cmul, nat1), cdiv, co(c1, cmul, c2))), wa(wcel(nat1, cc), wne(nat1, nat0)))

thm divadddiv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  eqtr2d(co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, co(c1, cdiv, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), caddc, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), caddc, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), cc), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cc), wa(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cc), wne(co(c2, cmul, c3), nat0)))
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), cc))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c3)
  ad2ant2lr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cc))
  adantrr(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cc))
  mulcl(c1, c2)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))), wa(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cc), wne(co(c2, cmul, c3), nat0)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cc), wne(co(c2, cmul, c3), nat0))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cc))
  mulcl(c2, c3)
  mulne0(c2, c3)
  divdir(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c3))
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), caddc, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(c0, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cdiv, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(c0, cdiv, c2), co(co(c3, cmul, c0), cdiv, co(c3, cmul, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cmul, c3), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3), co(c3, cmul, c0), co(c3, cmul, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  mulcomd(c0, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  mulcomd(c2, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  simpld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))), wceq(co(co(c3, cmul, c0), cdiv, co(c3, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cdiv, c2)), wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))))
  divcan5(c0, c2, c3)
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(c1, cdiv, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, cmul, c2), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3), co(c2, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  mulcomd(c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  simprll(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))), wceq(co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(c1, cdiv, c3)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))
  divcan5(c1, c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: divsubdiv
blocks.content: Subtraction of two ratios. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm divsubdiv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))), wceq(co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c1, cdiv, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3))))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c1, cdiv, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  eqtr3d(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c1, cdiv, c3)), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cdiv, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  sylanl2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))), wceq(co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cdiv, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3))), wcel(cneg(c1), cc))
  negcl(c1)
  divadddiv(c0, cneg(c1), c2, c3)
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cdiv, c3)), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cmin, co(c1, cdiv, c3)), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, cneg(co(c1, cdiv, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cdiv, c2), caddc, cneg(co(c1, cdiv, c3)), co(cneg(c1), cdiv, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))), wceq(cneg(co(c1, cdiv, c3)), co(cneg(c1), cdiv, c3)), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))
  divneg(c1, c3)
  negsubd(co(c0, cdiv, c2), co(c1, cdiv, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0))
  simprlr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))
  divcl(c0, c2)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c3), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))
  simprrr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))
  divcl(c1, c3)
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmin, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, c3), caddc, co(cneg(c1), cmul, c2), cneg(co(c1, cmul, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  mulneg1d(c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  negsubd(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c1, cmul, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  mulcld(c0, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))))
  simprrl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))
  mulcld(c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0))))
  simprll(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wne(c3, nat0)))
}

blocks.name: conjmul
blocks.content: Two numbers whose reciprocals sum to 1 are called "conjugates" and satisfy this relationship. Equation 5 of [Kreyszig] p. 12. (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm conjmul(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))), wb(wceq(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), nat1)))
} = {
  3bitr3d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))), wceq(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), nat1), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, nat1)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  eqeq12d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, nat1), co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(c0, caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(c1, caddc, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), c1, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), c1, co(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), cmul, c1), co(nat1, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  mul32d(c0, c1, co(nat1, cdiv, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), cmul, c1), co(nat1, cmul, c1)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), cmul, c1, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)))
  recid(c0)
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(nat1, cmul, c1), c1))
  mulid2(c1)
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), c0, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(c0, cmul, nat1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  mulassd(c0, c1, co(nat1, cdiv, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(c0, cmul, nat1)))
  oveq2d(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1, wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  recid(c1)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0))
  mulid1(c0)
  adddid(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(nat1, cdiv, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cc))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cc))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)))
  addcom(c0, c1)
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, nat1), co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  mulid1d(co(c0, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  syl12anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))), wb(wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, nat1)), wceq(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1)), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc), wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cc), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cc), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cc))
  reccl(c0)
  reccl(c1)
  addcl(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, c1))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c1)
  mulne0(c0, c1)
  mp3an2(wcel(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), cc), wa(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc), wne(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0)), wb(wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, nat1)), wceq(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  mulcan(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), nat1, co(c0, cmul, c1))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmul, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), nat1)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmul, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cmul, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), nat1), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  eqcom(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmul, c1))
  muleqadd(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: rereccl
blocks.content: Closure law for reciprocal. (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rereccl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr), wrex(hs0, cr, wceq(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cdiv, c0))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wrex(hs0, cr, wceq(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), wrex(hs0, cr, wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1)))
  ax-rrecex(hs0, c0)
  rexbidva(hs0, cr, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1))
  syl5bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1), wceq(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cv(hs0)))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cdiv, c0))
  syl112anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wb(wceq(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat1)), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0))
  1cnd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  recnd(cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  recnd(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  divmul(nat1, cv(hs0), c0)
  risset(hs0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rereccl(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ 0)→(1[÷]c0)∈ ℝ)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ 0), (1[÷]c0)∈ ℝ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs0 =(1[÷]c0)))
  mpbird((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ 0), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs0 =(1[÷]c0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(c0[×]hs0)= 1))
  ax-rrecex(hs0, c0)
  rexbidva(hs0, cr, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0 ≠ 0), hs0 =(1[÷]c0), (c0[×]hs0)= 1)

blocks.name: redivcl
blocks.content: Closure law for division of reals. (Contributed by NM, 27-Sep-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm redivcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr, co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(c0, cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  recnd(c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  recnd(c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  divrec(c0, c1)
  remulcld(c0, co(nat1, cdiv, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cr))
  rereccl(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm redivcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ≠ 0)→(c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[÷]c1), cr, (c0[×](1[÷]c1)), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ≠ 0), (c0[÷]c1)=(c0[×](1[÷]c1)), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, c1 ≠ 0)

  recnd(c1, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))

  simp3(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ≠ 0)
  divrec(c0, c1)
  remulcld(c0, (1[÷]c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))
  simp1(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ≠ 0)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ≠ 0, (1[÷]c1)∈ ℝ)
  rereccl(c1)
}

blocks.name: div2sub
blocks.content: Swap the order of subtraction in a division. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm div2sub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c2, c3))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c3, cmin, c2)), co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, cneg(co(c2, cmin, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c2, c3))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c2, c3)), wceq(co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, cneg(co(c2, cmin, c3))), co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c3))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wa(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cc), wne(co(c2, cmin, c3), nat0)))
  subcl(c0, c1)
  jca(w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cc), wne(co(c2, cmin, c3), nat0))
  3adant3(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c2, c3), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cc))
  subcl(c2, c3)
  biimp3ar(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c2, c3), wne(co(c2, cmin, c3), nat0))
  necon3bid(co(c2, cmin, c3), nat0, c2, c3, wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  subeq0(c2, c3)
  3expb(wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cc), wne(co(c2, cmin, c3), nat0), wceq(co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, cneg(co(c2, cmin, c3))), co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c3))))
  div2neg(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))
  oveqan12d(cneg(co(c0, cmin, c1)), cdiv, cneg(co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(c1, cmin, c0), co(c3, cmin, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), w3a(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c2, c3)))
  negsubdi2(c0, c1)
  3adant3(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wne(c2, c3), wceq(cneg(co(c2, cmin, c3)), co(c3, cmin, c2)))
  negsubdi2(c2, c3)
}

thm subrec(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))), wceq(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c0, cmul, c1))))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, c1)), co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(co(co(nat1, cmul, c1), cmin, co(nat1, cmul, c0)), cdiv, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  divsubdivd(nat1, c0, nat1, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  1cnd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  oveq1d(co(co(nat1, cmul, c1), cmin, co(nat1, cmul, c0)), cdiv, co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c1, cmin, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  oveq12d(co(nat1, cmul, c1), cmin, co(nat1, cmul, c0), c1, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  mulid2d(c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  mulid2d(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))

  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2), wceq(c0, co(c2, cdiv, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))

  impbid(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2), wceq(c0, co(c2, cdiv, c1)))
  syl5ib(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2), wceq(c0, co(c2, cdiv, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c1), co(c2, cdiv, c1)))
  oveq1(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2, cdiv, c1)
  eqeq1d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c1), co(c2, cdiv, c1), c0, w0)
  divcan4d(c0, c1, w0)
  syl5ib(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, cdiv, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cmul, c1)))
  oveq1(c0, co(c2, cdiv, c1), cmul, c1)
  eqeq2d(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(co(c2, cdiv, c1), cmul, c1), c2, w0)

}

thm lineq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), c3), wceq(c1, co(co(c3, cmin, c2), cdiv, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, c2), c3), wceq(c1, co(co(c3, cmin, c2), cdiv, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c3, cmin, c2)))
  addlsub(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  mulcld(c0, c1, w0)
  rdiv(c0, c1, co(c3, cmin, c2), w0)
  subcld(c3, c2, w0)
}
